Global event taking place in the Philippines,
Vietnamese rice has won the world's best rice award
According to the Tranger organization, founder and
owner of the world's best rice contest,
this year's contest has the participation of
more than 10 countries.  With 30 rice samples,
Vietnam's st25 rice won first prize,
Cambodia's rice won second place, and India's rice
won third prize. Previously, in 2019,
st25 rice also won first prize at the
world's best rice contest, which also took place.  Released in

Khanh Hoi border station, U

unknown reasons.  Origin has no relevant invoices or documents.
On the evening of November 28, the force

were many bunkers on the ship.  The
liquid crystal substance smelled of oil and many

on duty took people
and vehicles to Cuu Bien Hoi Hoi
to work. Mr. Tam admitted  I rented
another person's ship. The ship was registered to
operate a high-level counterfeit business, but when he went to sea, he
converted his own bunkers and mines equipped with

at sea. For each liter of oil he sold, he
made a profit.  From 900 VND to 1,000 VND,

wiped off the highway in the accident that
happened this morning on the road.
Ho Chi Minh City Trung Luong Expressway, section passing through
Chau Thanh district, Tien
Giang province, according to witnesses, the incident occurred
at about 8:30 a.m. The tractor was traveling from
Ho Chi Minh City to Tien Giang when it
suddenly wobbled.  The island rushed into the village, made an emergency stop,
collapsed nearly 30 meters, cleared Luy V
road, then continued to plunge into the hollow area
outside the highway.
After the accident, the tractor's head was bent
to the side and the container on the vehicle
fell down.  Luckily, the accident did
not harm anyone, but
vehicles and property were seriously damaged. We
received news that the authorities were
present to regulate traffic and handle the
incident. This morning, a fire broke out.
Suddenly, on Vo Van Kiet Street, District 1,
Ho Chi Minh City, the fire broke out
overnight and burned many
properties. According to initial information, around 3
a.m., some passersby suddenly saw
smoke rising.  Fire broke out at the
seafood business at 538 540 Vo
Van Kiet Street, Cau Kho Ward, District 1. Fire
broke out on the top floor of a three-
storey building. Short-circuited the cable line. Power went out.
People in the yards surrounding the building.  The fire was dry
enough for everyone to escape the
fire because there were many flammable substances in the house,
so the fire spread to the second floor of the
warehouse next door thanks to the police alerting
many fire extinguishers and
dozens of firefighters.  A group of soldiers quickly
arrived at the scene to extinguish the fire because the fire broke
out from above, so the soldiers had to
use a specialized ladder truck to approach the
fire. After about 30 minutes, the
cause and damage were controlled.
The fire is being clarified by the authorities.

After nearly two days of public trial, this afternoon,
representatives of the People's Procuracy of
Ho Chi Minh City announced the
indictment against Defendant Nguyen Minh Quan,
former director of Thu Duc City Hospital
and accomplice in the case.  embezzlement of
money laundering assets in violation of regulations on bidding,
causing serious consequences. Accordingly,
Quan was recommended for a sentence of 21 to 23 years in
prison according to the indictment of Nguyen Minh Quan for
taking advantage of his position and authority to direct Nguyen Van Loi.
Establishing and using
backyard companies to sign HP contracts to buy and sell on the
river to raise prices of machinery and equipment,
then prepare documents to participate in bidding for
Thu Duc city hospital. At the same time, the
army directed to put pressure on the government.
Government officials colluded with interests to
set backyard companies to win 27
medical equipment and machinery supply packages.
After being paid, Quan
directed Loi to withdraw money to appropriate more than 103
billion VND in foreign countries.  The controlled prison sentence
requires defendant Quan to pay
more than 102 billion VND in compensation to
Thu Duc city hospital and continue to distrain
property, real estate, of defendant Quan and his wife
to ensure enforcement of the judgment in court.  Quan
presented his contributions
during his work so that the
jury could consider that the defendant, company director
Nguyen Tam, was sentenced to a maximum of 18 years in
prison. The defendant, Nguyen Tran Ngoc Diem, is
Quan's wife.  recommend up to 3 years and 6 months in prison. The
remaining defendants are recommended to receive a
maximum sentence of 4 years and 6 months in
prison. Recent information has also ended the
